channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bengals WR Ja'Marr Chase Suspended For Spit at Steelers CB Jalen Ramsey
item.description: Ja'Marr Chase won't be in action when the Cincinnati Bengals take on the New England Patriots in a key Week 12 matchup.

item.title: Nick’s Chiefs cause ‘dismay’ after loss to Broncos, Believe KC will still make the playoffs? | FTF
item.description: The Kansas City Chiefs lost to the Denver Broncos 22-19, and are now 5-5. Nick Wright, Chris Broussard, and Kevin Wildes discuss the “shocking” loss a...

item.title: Big Ten Power Rankings: Ohio State Leads the Way; Penn State Climbs, Iowa Falls
item.description: FOX Sports' Michael Cohen offers up his latest Big Ten Power Rankings with Ohio State on top, Penn State surging and Iowa falling.

item.title: Bulgaria vs Georgia: How to Watch, World Cup Qualifying Preview
item.description: Preview Bulgaria vs Georgia in World Cup Qualifying with TV info, start time, betting odds, and recent form ahead of kickoff.

item.title: Ex-UNO player admits to point-shaving scheme
item.description: Former University of New Orleans men's basketball player Dae Dae Hunter has acknowledged his role in a point-shaving scheme last season.

item.title: Sources: Penix expected to miss rest of season

item.title: Bengals' Chase suspended one game for spitting
item.description: Bengals wide receiver Ja'Marr Chase has been suspended one game without pay for spitting on Steelers defensive back Jalen Ramsey.
